name: Tristana
title: the Yordle Gunner
lore: While many other yordles channel their energy into discovery, invention, or just plain mischief-making, Tristana was always inspired by the adventures of great warriors. She had heard much about Runeterra, its factions, and its wars, and believed her kind could become worthy of legend too. Setting foot in the world for the first time, she took up her trusty cannon Boomer, and now leaps into battle with steadfast courage and optimism.
blurb: While many other yordles channel their energy into discovery, invention, or just plain mischief-making, Tristana was always inspired by the adventures of great warriors. She had heard much about Runeterra, its factions, and its wars, and believed her...
allytips: Her massive gun allows Tristana to fire on targets at a great distance. Utilize this to prevent your enemies from ever laying a hand on you.
Use Rocket Jump after you have stacked up your Explosive Charge on an enemy to finish them off with a burst of damage.
Use Rapid Fire to help stack up your Explosive Charge on enemy champions.
enemytips: If you see Tristana activate Rapid Fire in a fight, stun her and try to back off until the spell dissipates.
Stand away from your creeps in a lane to take less collateral damage from Explosive Charge.

riot_spells.name: Rapid Fire
riot_spells.description: Tristana fires her weapon rapidly, increasing her Attack Speed for a short time.
riot_spells.tooltip: <spellPassive>Active: </spellPassive>Increases Tristana's Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds.

riot_spells.name: Rocket Jump
riot_spells.description: Tristana fires at the ground to propel her to a distant location, dealing damage and slowing surrounding units for a brief period where she lands.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Tristana launches herself to target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and slowing surrounding enemies by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Kills, Assists, and max stack Explosive Charge detonations on Champions reset Rocket Jump's cooldown.

riot_spells.name: Explosive Charge
riot_spells.description: When Tristana kills a unit, her cannonballs burst into shrapnel, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Can be activated to place a bomb on a target enemy that explodes after a short duration dealing damage to surrounding units.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Passive: Enemies explode when slain by Tristana's basic attacks, dealing {{ passivedamage }} Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

Active: Places a bomb on an enemy or turret that explodes after {{ activeduration }} seconds, dealing {{ activedamage }} Physical Damage. Each attack and ability charges the bomb's damage by +{{ activeperstackamp*100 }}%, up to a maximum of {{ activemaxdamage }}.

At {{ activemaxstacks }} charges, the bomb explodes immediately. The detonation radius is twice as large if used on a turret.

riot_spells.name: Buster Shot
riot_spells.description: Tristana loads a massive cannonball into her weapon and fires it at an enemy unit. This deals Magic Damage and knocks the target back. If the target is carrying the Explosive Charge bomb, the bomb detonation radius is doubled.
riot_spells.tooltip: Tristana fires a massive cannonball at an enemy unit. This deals {{ damagecalc }} Magic Damage and knocks surrounding units back {{ knockbackdistance }} distance.

riot_passive.name: Draw a Bead
riot_passive.description: Increases Tristana's Attack Range as she levels.

i1.name: Draw a Bead
i1.blurb: Increases Tristana's Attack Range as she levels.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} The {{sti|range}} of '''Tristana's''' [[basic attack]]s, {{ai|Explosive Charge|Tristana}} and {{ai|Buster Shot|Tristana}} is increased by {{pp|0 to 136}} for a total of {{pp|525 to 661}} range.
i1.notes: * '''Tristana''' can attack {{ui|Baron Nashor}} over the back wall once she hits level 15, a feature shared by {{ci|Caitlyn}}.

q1.name: Rapid Fire
q1.blurb: Tristana fires her weapon rapidly, increasing her Attack Speed for a short time.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Tristana''' gains {{sti|Attack speed|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 7 seconds.
q1.notes: * ''Rapid Fire'' is a non-refreshing buff that will not update on rank-up.

w1.name: Rocket Jump
w1.blurb: Tristana fires at the ground to propel her to a distant location, dealing damage and slowing surrounding units for a brief period where she lands.
w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Tristana''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} to the target location, dealing {{tip|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies on impact and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 60%.
w1.description2: On enemy champion {{tip|takedown|takedowns}} or upon detonating {{ai|Explosive Charge|Tristana}} at maximum stacks on an enemy champion, ''Rocket Jump's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reset.
w1.notes:
* '''Tristana''' can still use basic attacks, abilities, summoner spells and item actives while in the air.
* ''Rocket Jump's'' speed depends on the distance of the jump. {{tip|Melee}} range jumps are much shorter while long range jumps leave '''Tristana''' in the air significantly longer.
* '''Tristana''' is still targetable while jumping and can be hit by [[skillshot]]s such as {{cai|Enchanted Crystal Arrow|Ashe}} and {{cai|Mystic Shot|Ezreal}}.
** Non-{{tip|airborne}} crowd control effects, such as {{tip|stun|stuns}} and {{tip|root|roots}}, will take effect upon landing and will '''''not''''' cancel the jump, with the exception of {{cai|Event Horizon|Veigar}}.
** All {{tip|airborne}} crowd control effects, such as {{tip|airborne|knockups}}, {{tip|airborne|knockbacks}} and {{tip|airborne|pulls}}, '''''will''''' cancel the jump and then complete their effects as normal.

e1.name: Explosive Charge
e1.blurb: When Tristana kills a unit, her cannonballs burst into shrapnel, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Can be activated to place a bomb on a target enemy that explodes after a short duration dealing damage to surrounding units.
e1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} Enemies explode when slain by '''Tristana's''' basic attacks, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies.
e1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Tristana''' places an explosive charge on the target enemy or enemy turret. After 4 seconds the charge explodes, dealing {{tip|physical damage}} to nearby enemies. The explosion radius is increased when used on a {{tip|turret}}.
e1.leveling2: {{st|Minimum Physical Damage|{{ap|70 to 110}} {{as|(+ {{ap|50 to 130}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}}}
e1.description3: '''Tristana's''' basic attacks and abilities against the target increase ''Explosive Charge's'' damage by 30%, stacking up to 4 times for a maximum 120% increase, upon which the charge also detonates instantly.
e1.notes:
* ''Explosive Charge's'' active range doesn't benefit from {{ii|Rapid Firecannon}}.
* ''Explosive Charge's'' cast time is reduced with {{sti|attack speed}}.
* '''Tristana''' will automatically be ordered to attack the target of ''Explosive Charge''.
* All ''Explosive Charge'' explosions will affect turrets.

r1.name: Buster Shot
r1.blurb: Tristana loads a massive cannonball into her weapon and fires it at an enemy unit. This deals Magic Damage and knocks the target back. If the target is carrying the Explosive Charge bomb, the bomb detonation radius is doubled.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Tristana''' fires a massive cannonball at the target enemy, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|airborne|knocking back}} the target and all enemies around them.
r1.notes:
* '''Tristana''' will automatically be ordered to attack the target of ''Buster Shot''.
* The initial target is affected by {{tip|single target}} spell effects, while subsequent targets take {{tip|area of effect}}.
